summary: Lyla The combat ranger is found in Riverwood in the Sleeping Giant Inn
descriptionHtml: This is Lyla The Combat Ranger, I created her due to me thinking that Vanilla followers were poo... In a really big way. This ones rich and has really good stats. Being as she is a ranger she prefers ranged combat over close well you know she is a lady after all ;-). She can be a spouse and does all the things spouse\'s do. Oh and did I mention she was rich... I mean really rich, so good company for my fellow pimp golddigger\'s.
author: minesawhiskey
